sentences: Ta teeksid seda kohe, kui sa paluksid.
Ma teeksin sulle hea meelega tee, aga mul pole vett.
Kui ma oleksin sina, ma teeksin kõik teisiti.
context: The verb 'teeksid' is the conditional form of the verb 'tegema' (to do/make) in Estonian. It expresses what someone *would* do under certain circumstances or as a hypothetical action. It’s commonly used to express politeness, offers, or possibilities.
